headline: Caesars Republic Lake Tahoe Introduces Tessie’s Cocktails & Chords, an All-New Cocktail Lounge That Blends Local Legend with Music and Mixology, in Partnership with Clique Hospitality
summary: STATELINE, Nev., February 03, 2026--Building on the momentum of the resort’s rebrand and summer 2025 debut, Caesars Entertainment is pleased to announce the launch of Phase Two of the $200 million transformation of Caesars Republic Lake Tahoe Hotel & Casino, formerly Harveys Lake Tahoe. Phase Two introduces elevated enhancements to the resort’s pool experience, meetings and conventions space and a new bar and lounge inspired by a local legend in partnership with Clique Hospitality.
